title: Medal of Honor™ Warfighter
description: Written by active U.S. Tier 1 Operators while deployed overseas and inspired by real world threats, Medal of Honor™ Warfighter  delivers an aggressive, gritty, and authentic experience that puts gamers in the boots of today’s most precise and disciplined warrior. Medal of Honor Warfighter is an up close and personal look at today’s battlefield and the fight against the ongoing global terror threat.    Medal of Honor Warfighter tells the story of U.S. Tier 1 Operator, “Preacher” as he returns home from overseas only to find his family torn apart from years of deployment. Trying to pick up the pieces to salvage what remains of his marriage, Preacher is reminded of what he’s fighting for - family. But when an extremely deadly explosive (PETN) penetrates civilian borders and his two worlds collide, Preacher and his fellow teammates are sent in to solve the problem. They take the fight to the enemy and do whatever it takes to protect their loved ones from harm.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Medal of Honor Warfighter™ Announce Trailer
childDownloads.description: Official Medal of Honor Warfighter Announce Trailer. Inspired by actual events across the globe and written by real Tier 1 Operators while deployed overseas, follow the global Warfighters as they are asked to take on a real terror threat, PETN, and solve the problem at hand.  For more information about the Global Operators and the Most Authentic Shooter to date, go to http://www.medalofhonor.com/

childDownloads.title: Medal of Honor Warfighter E3 Multiplayer Trailer
childDownloads.description: The Official Medal of Honor E3 Multiplayer Gameplay trailer. Watch as US SFOD-D, NAVY SEALs, US OGA, Polish GROM, Australian SASR and Canadian JTF2 compete for title of best of the best.

childDownloads.title: Medal of Honor Warfighter Fireteam Trailer
childDownloads.description: Get up close and personal with Fireteams,  a unique approach to co-op style multilpayer gameplay. A unit of two who operate as a team within the team. Fireteam buddies can be seen anywhere on the map, act as a spawn point, and protect your six in a firefight.

childDownloads.title: MEDAL OF HONOR™ WARFIGHTER ZERO DARK THIRTY
childDownloads.description: Inspired by the decade-long manhunt for the World’s Most Wanted man, the “Zero Dark Thirty” Map Pack takes the player to some of the world's most dangerous places: Darra Gun Market and Chitral Compound.  Take the fight to areas that were thought to be Osama Bin Laden's hideouts in the Pakistan area.  Darra is home to dozens of back-alley shops and self-taught machinists making guns by hand. Chitral, set in the mountains of Pakistan was thought to be one of the notorious hideout locations for terrorist organizations. Take the fight to the biggest maps in Medal of Honor Warfighter with your Fireteam buddy in this Map Pack!

childDownloads.title: Multiplayer Launch Gameplay Trailer
childDownloads.description: The Official Medal of Honor Warfighter Multiplayer Launch Gameplay Trailer. Choose your global Warfighter and dominate online with your Fireteam buddy in customized multiplayer battles. Six classes. Eight real world locations. Twelve international Warfighters. Thirty-five map mode combinations. Thousands of Fireteam combinations. Play online and represent your nation to prove which elite Global Warfighters are the best of the best.
